summary: MY FUTURE DAUGHTER IN LAW OWNS A VOLKSWAGEN JETTA.  WENT TO GAS STATION FOR GAS AND COULD NOT FILL THE TANK.  TOOK THE CAR TO VOLKSWAGEN DEALER WHERE THEY ARE CHARGING OVER 800. DOLLARS TO PUT IN A NEW GAS TANK, SINCE THE CAR IS RELATIVELY NEW THIS SEEMS LIKE IT SHOULD BE A RECALL. OR AT LEAST UNDER WARRANTY. IF SHE WAS ON THE HIGHWAY SHE WOULD HAVE BEEN STUCK IN THE LANES WITH NO WAY OF FILLING THAT TANK...CAN YOU RESEARCH THESE GAS TANKS FOR THE SAFETY OF PEOPLE.    *NLM
